flex_direction.$description: [NO-FIGMA-SUPPORT] CSS flex-direction for vertical button layout. HTML/CSS implementation only - use button.container component variants in Figma.

align_items.$description: [NO-FIGMA-SUPPORT] CSS align-items for full-width buttons. HTML/CSS implementation only - use button.container component variants in Figma.

justify_content.$description: [NO-FIGMA-SUPPORT] CSS justify-content for button positioning. HTML/CSS implementation only - use button.container component variants in Figma.

width.$description: [NO-FIGMA-SUPPORT] CSS width for buttons - fills container for better touch targets. HTML/CSS implementation only - use button.container component variants in Figma.
